title: Template Service Source Type Swap
header_subtext: This bookmarklet will swap the source type of a service in a template
custom_instructions: Drag the link to your bookmarks bar
Open a template service page with URL format: /workspace/templates/<uuid>/service/<uuid>
If the service uses an image source, you'll be prompted to enter a repository
If the service uses a repository source, you'll be prompted to enter an image
Confirm the swap and the template will be updated
